about_the_game:
You will be ando.This is a casual game .
In this game ,the player will be a magic children who will run across diffrent place to find the parents .There are gold coins and gems on the road for Ando to collect.The road is made of stones of various colors floating in the air. There will be large gaps between some stones and they will keeping move. If Ando accidentally falls, he will be reborn at the beginning of each level and start running again.Ando will keep running. If he reaches the finish line successfully, he will win.but it is not easy.Ando's friends will run by and wait for ando's arrival at the finish lineand.
This is a game that brings joy and laughter to the family.Very easy to pick up and control.Players constantly use various cool jumping actions to cross various obstacles and traps.jump，jump and Jump as much as you want.You will encounter some difficulties.Some cute little animals such as ladybugs can bring you a lot of obstacles and troubles.But don't be afraid, in this fantastic world you will use magical powers to reach the end and win
detailed_description:
You will be ando.This is a casual game .
In this game ,the player will be a magic children who will run across diffrent place to find the parents .There are gold coins and gems on the road for Ando to collect.The road is made of stones of various colors floating in the air. There will be large gaps between some stones and they will keeping move. If Ando accidentally falls, he will be reborn at the beginning of each level and start running again.Ando will keep running. If he reaches the finish line successfully, he will win.but it is not easy.Ando's friends will run by and wait for ando's arrival at the finish lineand.
This is a game that brings joy and laughter to the family.Very easy to pick up and control.Players constantly use various cool jumping actions to cross various obstacles and traps.jump，jump and Jump as much as you want.You will encounter some difficulties.Some cute little animals such as ladybugs can bring you a lot of obstacles and troubles.But don't be afraid, in this fantastic world you will use magical powers to reach the end and win
name: cool go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx2050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: a very fun fantastic game.Suitable for families to play together and spend a wonderful leisure time.you will be a magic boy,running in a fantastic world just like you comeback to your childhood.
